#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define i64 long long
#define pb push_back
#define MAX(a,b) ((a) > (b)?(a):(b))

int dp[100005];
char s[1000005];
int main()
{
	//ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	//cin >> t;
	//scan(t);
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		//memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
		//string s;
		//cin >> s;
		scanf("%s",s);
		int m;
		//cin >> m;
		//scan(m);
		scanf("%d",&m);
		
		int len = strlen(s);
		dp[0] = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < len ; i++)
			dp[i+1] = dp[i] + (s[i] == 'A');
		
		//for(int i = 0; i < len ; i++)
			//cout << dp[i+1] << " ";cout << endl;
		int ans = -1;
		for(int i = m; i<= len;i++){
			ans = MAX(ans,(dp[i] - dp[i-m]));
		}
		//cout << ans << endl;
		printf("%d\n",m-ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
